abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Electrode has no Energy attached to it, you may search your deck for a [D] or Dark [M] Energy and attach it to Dark Electrode. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Electrode is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may move all Energy cards attached to Dark Electrode to your Benched Pok√©mon in any way you like.
